title: Пepвaя oтpицaтeльнaя
overview: Tough, independent policewoman Ulzhan and timid, traditional Kelinka Aisha end up in the hospital with severe injuries. Doctors connect the girls to a heart-lung machine, transfusing their blood to each other to save their lives. Waking up, Ulzhan and Aisha gradually notice that their habits and characters have changed. Now the girls have to adapt to reality and face the consequences of their changed characters.
